title: I Am...A Guided Journal
description: "I Am...Two of the most powerful words; for what you put after them shapes your reality." ~Don Miguel Ruiz This amazing 192-page guided journal will gently guide you through hundreds of soul-stirring prompts and playful questions to clarify your thoughts and desires.* Improve your thoughts, self-esteem, happiness, joy, sense of identity, and habits* Increase self-love and self-compassion* Gentle motivation and guidance for self-improvement* Command attention with the power of “I Am”* Step into your sacred power* Perfect gift for the spiritual women in your life
author: Heather Dakota
